about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of Harmonia is now available on Steam!
With 17 tracks in both FLAC and MP3 formats, download the Harmonia Original Soundtrack now to relive your Harmonia experience anywhere!

* This soundtrack DLC is a digital version of the original 2017 soundtrack album Harmonia Original Soundtrack (KLSA-0134) and features 17 tracks.

Harmonia Original Soundtrack Track list

1. Terrarum

2. Oppidum
3. Vitae
4. Cantus
5. Library
6. Tristitia
7. Risu
8. Rruinis
9. Pecado
10. Scindet
11. Reditum
12. Caveam
13. Harmonia
14. Spero
15. halitus
16. Todoketai Melody (Game size ver.)
17. Towa no Hoshi e
